Articles.Content:
False. And you were supposed to laugh at it.

The user below me would like to call me Roflnuts, like Chobit there.

False, I don't just throw serious things like that around.

The user below me is tired of school.

True. As far as I know work doesn't have homework.

The user below me thinks homework is interfering with everything.

True, homework is just how the establishment trains you to work off the clock.

User below me thinks the former statement is false.

False. Infact there might be more to it.

The user below me has work. And has homework to do because of it.

Work, yes; homework, NO! I finished my homework already. But my mother is making me do her cards, and mann, that's a lot of vocabulary...

The next person has a mother who's studying ESL.

Nope, but I'm learning jap for school.

The user below me knows a language other than english. Or some of it.

Vrai, mais mon accent est mauvais.

The user below me knows what I just wrote.

False, it's just gibberish to me.

The user below me will translate it to english.

Translation:

True, but my accent is bad.

LOL I just used Google Translate when I saw this post...

The next user knows the language I'm speaking as well as answering it (I won't be crazy if you used Google Translate):

Ã¤Â¸â€¹Ã¤Â¸â‚¬Ã¤Â¸ÂªÃ§â€Â¨Ã¦Ë†Â·Ã§Å¸Â¥Ã©Ââ€œÃ¨â€¡Â³Ã¥Â°â€˜1Ã¤Â¸ÂªÃ¨Â¯Â­Ã¨Â¨â‚¬Ã£â‚¬â€š

NOTE: Sorry, I've been in the US for a while and I guess I've grown lax in speaking the language I'm speaking.

Nope, I forgot how to language.

The user below forgot how to rocket.

False. You never forget how to rock it!

User below me thinks I am lame.

False, but you make lame jokes

The user below me has played Bubsy.

Nope.

The user below me wishes they could make good art.

Nope.

The next user have played SpaceChem.

False, but I do think it is interesting.

The user below me is feeling hungry right now.

False, just had breakfast

The user below me is angry at me for my lack of punctuation

True. I ran out of Toblerones...

[EDIT]: Sniped as usual. And I'm angry at you for EVERYTHING.

The user below me has recently tripped while climbing a set of stairs

False. Only people who are snipped trip while climbing stairs.

The user below me agrees.

False. I trip on stairs due to my shoes more than snippers.

The user below me is a bear.

False, but bear taste good

User below me has eaten a kiwi

True, I was known for eating excessive amounts of kiwi back in the day.

The user below me has gotten into a fistfight with a dog before

False, although my dog and I occasionally get into fights over who gets to have the dog toy.

The next user owns or has owned at some point in their life a cat or a dog.

True. A cat and a dog. At separate times

The user below me has an earthworm as his/her pet.

False.

The user below me is below me.
